title: Steppin' On The Flowers
description: Use Void Walk.

title: Enter the Cage (Purple)
description: Complete the Prologue as Amets.

title: Enter the Cage (Green)
description: Complete the Prologue as Martzel.

title: Enter the Cage (Blue)
description: Complete the Prologue as Nikole.

title: Enter the Cage (Red)
description: Complete the Prologue as Aintzane.

title: You Used To Call Me...
description: Get the unused Universal Communicator (phone).

title: Secretly Well-Armed
description:
Solve the puzzle to get the hidden 
Tipped Dagger in the Incipite Forest.

title: Onto the Water
description:
Defeat Lance to gain access to a boat in the 
Grand Waterways.

title: A Poetic Hint
description:
Find the crystal in Chapter One that tells 
you how to complete the final boss.

title: A Knife Key Of Things To Come
description: Find the Worn Dagger.

title: What is this thing?
description: Find the secret ERROR_SLIME miniboss.

title: A lover, not a fighter?
description: Recruit Abby to your party.

title: Kiss and Tell
description:
Unlock a hidden route by having Abby 
use "Kiss" 21 times.

title: Powers of Creation
description: Use a crafting table.

title: No More Tutorials
description: Complete Chapter One.

title: Breakfast The Morning After
description: Eat Abby's Meal of Love. Tastes like desire.

title: Missed Apology
description:
Try and fail to apologize to Lehiakide
 for stuff you likely don't remember doing.

title: Increasing Your Power
description:
Unlock the Bracer of Sleeping Fists in 
the Great Cliffs.

title: Touch a Girl's Heart From Between Her Wings
description: Complete Goizane's first task on the secret route.

title: Dusty Step
description: Use Waypoint Warp.

title: Unwinding the Music Box
description: Get caught by The Mansion's statues.

title: >ACT
description: Befriend Lehiakide using the Flirt skill.

title: Taming the Tsundere
description: Romance Lehiakide in Chapter Two.

title: >FIGHT
description: Choose to defeat Lehiakide with violence.

title: Opening your Wings
description: Complete Chapter Two.

title: More of a Speed Bump
description: Defeat Lance in the Broken Islands in Chapter Three.

title: Pickin' Up a Cold Open
description: Get Lehiakide's number in Chapter Three.

title: ...But You Can Never Leave
description: Rent a hotel room from Abusari.

title: That's It?! That's the Secret!?
description: Find the Nothing.

title: Cerebus Knocks
description: Find Goizane's body in Chapter Three.

title: Are We The Baddies?
description: Fight Izoztutako in the Hotel Kaiola.

title: What was that?
description: Find a secret in the Infinite Field.

title: Checksum Checked
description:
Fight Kara inside the code of the 
Hotel Kaiola.

title: Long-Range Smoke Run
description: Give Ross Bot cigarettes.

title: Behind-the-Scenes Preview
description:
Read the secret journal in the 
Hotel Kaiola's Library.

title: You're the faker here!
description: Defeat the fake Abby in Chapter Three.

title: That's Just Business.
description: Kill Abusari in Chapter Three.

title: Three Stars; Poor Service, Nice Bed
description:
Complete Chapter Three quickly 
by sleeping in your bed.

title: That's How Doors Work, Right?
description:
Skip the second Abusari fight by 
clipping into the final door.

title: One Star; Never Coming Here Again
description:
Complete Chapter Three by going into 
the final door.

title: Mysterious Rendition
description: Play the player piano in Euclid's Nightmare.

title: Here Comes the Big Guns
description: Recruit Lehiakide in Chapter Four.

title: Taking Back the First Throne
description: Recruit Haizea in Chapter Four.

title: Hacking It, And By It I Mean...
description: Recruit Ross Bot in Chapter Four.

title: Cold Storage
description: Complete the lights puzzle in the icy chamber.

title: Trivia Champion
description: Complete Zelatatu's 200 IQ Quiz.

title: The Yandere Appears
description:
Meet Tximista with Lehiakide in your party, 
learning something interesting about her.

title: Checking The Void
description: Fight Kara in Chapter Four.

title: Dead Game: Do Not Eat
description: Get your game turned off by Iruzurra.

title: Crystal Collectathon
description:
Solve the crystal-collection puzzle in 
Chapter Four.

title: Bashing With the Berserker
description: Fight Basati in Chapter Four.

title: What Anime Is This?
description:
Witness Haizea turn into her Super Form 
in Chapter Four.

title: Fool's Award
description: Get killed in a highly foolish way.

title: Rank: RD
description:
Get the "Redemption Demotion" ending 
in Chapter Four.

title: Rank: StST
description:
Get the "Shattering the Sky Throne" ending 
in Chapter Four.

title: Rank: PoNT
description:
Get the "Practice of Neo-Thermidorianism" ending 
in Chapter Four.

title: Rank: FCC
description:
Get the "Fourth (Chapter) Crusade" ending 
in Chapter Four.

title: Rank: RR
description:
Get the "Recuperated Renegade" ending 
in Chapter Four.

title: Rank: SS
description:
Get the "Sky Skirmisher" ending 
in Chapter Four.

title: Rank: BTAM
description:
Get the "Bomb-Throwing Anti-Monarchist" ending 
in Chapter Four.

title: Rank: TGB
description:
Get the "The Grey Baron" ending 
in Chapter Four.

title: Rank: TTM
description:
Get the secret "The Tsundere Mystique" ending 
in Chapter Four.

title: Rank: UtU
description:
Get the secret "Usurp the Usurper" ending 
in Chapter Four.
